headerInput.EMAIL: Email address of the user you wish to log in as
headerInput.PASSWORD: Password of the user you wish to log in as

headerOutput.Token: Authentication token to be provided in 'TOKEN' header field when querying any of the other endpoints

Any Authentication required.authDesc: To use the endpoints detailed in this section, a valid authentication token must be supplied in a HTTP header named 'TOKEN'. Tokens last for one hour after being generated.

/api/external/categories.php.output: Skill Categories IDs and corresponding names

input.categoryId: ID for the chosen skill category

/api/external/skills.php.output: List of skill objects for the specified category, each containing an ID for the skill, the ID of the category the skill belongs to, and the skill name

api/external/jobTypes.php.output: List of job/work schedule types by ID

Employer Authentication required.authDesc: To use the endpoints detailed in this section, a valid Employer authentication token must be supplied in a HTTP header named 'TOKEN'. Tokens last for one hour after being generated.

api/external/employer.php.desc: Display information for the currently logged-in employer
api/external/employer.php.output: All fields stored in the system specific to this employer
api/external/employer.php.exampleOutput:
{
	"result": "success",
	"details": {
		"companyName": "Red N Blue Pty Ltd",
		"title": "Mrs",
		"firstName": "Myra",

		"phoneAreaCode": "08",
		"phoneNumber": "99046371",
		"mobileNumber": "0416172771",
		"otherTitle": "Mrs",
		"otherFirstName": "Regina",
		"otherLastName": "Rodriquez",
		"otherPhoneAreaCode": "08",
		"otherPhoneNumber": "98004649",
		"address1": "127 Marie Dodd Cres.",
		"address2": "",
		"city": "Perth",
		"state": "WA",
		"postcode": "6000",
		"companyType": "2",
		"companySize": "100-499",
		"expectedGrowth": "20-49",
		"location": "Perth",
		"email": "Myra.Atkins@rednblue.com.au"
	},
	"documentation": "HTTP://ec2-18-221-135-88.us-east-2.compute.amazonaws.com/api/external/index.php"
}

api/external/employerMatches.php.desc: List all Job Seekers matching the specified job

input.jobId: The ID for the job the employer wishes to see matches for

api/external/employerMatches.php.output: List details for Job Seekers matching the specified job

Job Seeker Authentication required.authDesc: To use the endpoints detailed in this section, a valid Job Seeker authentication token must be supplied in a HTTP header named 'TOKEN'. Tokens last for one hour after being generated.

api/external/jobSeekerMatches.php.desc: Display details of jobs that the job seeker is a match for

Admin Authentication required.authDesc: To use the endpoints detailed in this section, a valid Admin authentication token must be supplied in a HTTP header named 'TOKEN'. Tokens last for one hour after being generated.

/api/external/admin/addSkill.php.desc: Add a new skill to the specified category

input.categoryId: The ID for the category the new skill should be added to
input.skillName: The name of the new skill

input.categoryId: The ID for the category the skill currently belongs to
input.skillId: The ID for the skill to be renamed
input.newName: The new name for the skill

input.categoryId: The ID for the category the skill currently belongs to
input.skillId: The ID for the skill to be deleted
